review: the perfect solution to my extra TV that is not hooked to cable.
author: constance c.

review: I bought the stick because I found Netflix limited and a hassle to keep up.  I can now watch all the Downton Abbey episodes I missed and catch up.  But it took my engineer husband all weekend to figure out how to install and make it work.  Other folks may not have the same difficulty, but the stick came with no instructions or troubleshooting whatsoever.  End result is good.
author: Kindle Customer

review: I'll give more stars once you can mirror your phone or laptop, instead of just youtube to it
author: Karl Wendel Rice

review: This is great if it works on your TV.  I have an older TV in my living room and it did not work.  I called Amazon customer service, and we tried a number of things to fix it, but we couldn't get it working.  I have a newer TV in my bedroom, so I tried it on that TV and it worked out of the box.
author: AnnLouise

review: 5 stars if they could add  Vudu app.
author: Khris San Diego
